DOC.brief_summary: To characterize GORE® Hybrid Vascular Graft compare non-heparin bond synthetic vascular graft term prevalence persistence anti-platelet factor 4 / heparin antibody ( anti-PF4 / H antibody ) .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Anti-platelet Factor 4/Heparin Antibodies Hemodialysis Patients
DOC.criteria: The patient candidate native fistula . The patient require creation upper arm vascular access graft hemodialysis secondary diagnosis EndStage Renal Disease . The patient hemodialysis ≥1 month . The patient schedule different surgical procedure within 30 day post Index Procedure . The patient know hypercoagulable disorder bleed disorder . The patient previous instance Heparin Induced Thrombocytopenia Type II ( HIT type II ) know sensitivity heparin .
